WorkItem.Description:
Test:
----
$worksheet->getDefaultRowDimension()->setRowHeight(30);
...
$writer->save('test.xls')
 
Expected result:
----
All rows, no matter row index, pick up the default row height unless other row height has been explicitly set.
 
Actual result:
----
Only rows within the sheet dimensions pick up the default row height
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel: latest source from SVN (1.6.3+)
WorkItem.Summary: Default row height not working above highest row using PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5
